name: Absent (itch)
description:
18+ Recommended..

Absent
Release Date - 8th April 2019
Absent is the First of many upcoming Short Stories being released by LunarSoul.

Situated in the UK, we hope to explore many different themes with our releases to gauge both criticism and dialogue with our players.

Join the Lunar Soul Discord here - https://discord.gg/KFrCTfj
